DataElement.preferredName: MASCC Antiemesis Tool During Delayed Period How Much Nausea Score 11 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the amount of nausea they have experienced on the second day during the first week of chemotherapy, using an 11 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: MASCC Antiemesis Tool During Delayed Period How Much Nausea Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to assess a patient's level of nausea and vomiting associated with chemotherapy._Nausea and vomiting occurring more than 24 hours following chemotherapy._A question about how much nausea an individual experienced during the specified time period._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Multinational Association of Supportive Care in Cancer Antiemesis Tool
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to assess a patient's level of nausea and vomiting associated with chemotherapy.

Concepts.longName: Multinational Association of Supportive Care in Cancer Antiemesis Tool
Concepts.definition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to assess a patient's level of nausea and vomiting associated with chemotherapy.

Property.preferredName: Delayed Nausea and Vomiting How Much Nausea During This Period Score

Concepts.definition: Nausea and vomiting occurring more than 24 hours following chemotherapy.

Concepts.longName: How Much Nausea During This Period
Concepts.definition: A question about how much nausea an individual experienced during the specified time period.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredName: As Much as Possible Quantity Score 11 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11_The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._an ordered reference standard.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: A score of 1 on an eleven-point scale from 0 to 10

ValueMeaning.preferredName: A score of 1 on an eleven-point scale from 0 to 10
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: A response that indicates the largest amount imagined.: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11: The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.: A subjective score of 1 on a Likert scale.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
A response that indicates the largest amount imagined.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.
A subjective score of 1 on a Likert scale.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11:The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.:an ordered reference standard.

Concepts.definition: How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
